problem.markdown:
Classify the statement below as A, E, I, or O.
>>All computer scientists are logicians<<
(x) A (Universal Affirmative)
( ) E (Universal Negative)
( ) I (Particular Affirmative)
( ) O (Particular Negative)

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Classify the statement below as A, E, I, or O.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: All computer scientists are logicians
